headline: How New Tomahawk Deal and C-130 Contracts Will Impact RTX (RTX) Investors
summary: In recent days, Collins Aerospace, an RTX business, signed three-year parts distribution agreements for C-130 Hercules wheels and brakes while RTX also secured a US$380.80 million Tomahawk missile recertification and modernization contract that lifts the total deal value to US$476.50 million through 2029. Together with rising US and allied defense budgets and RTX’s role in major air traffic control radar upgrades and space missions, these developments underline how deeply the company is tied...
